mapper.select: SELECT p.mf_plan_code, p.mf_plan_name, d.pro_code, d.pro_name, p.mf_plan_date, o.de_date, d.need_num, d.total_order_num, p.mf_plan_status FROM mf_plan p JOIN mf_plan_detail d ON p.mf_plan_code = d.mf_plan_code LEFT JOIN orders o ON p.order_code = o.order_code
